## 279. HEAD
### Definition
The part of the body of an animal or human which contains the brain, mouth and main sense organs. (Concepticon) Not to be confused with: (a) narrower terms like ‘occiput’, ‘crown (of the head)’, etc.; (b) ‘brain’, ‘mind’, etc.; (c) metaphorical ‘head’ > ‘top’, ‘chief’, etc.  (GLD)

### Contexts
1. While fighting, he hit him on the head. (GLD) 2. This stone is the same size as a human head. (GLD)
